Articles.Content:
Now that we have twekables this would be great for many uses (ex. unabalanced vehicles like shuttles)

In my shuttle replica, I have to shut off all the engines when the boosters deacouple and set 2 of then engines to 50%, then throttle up, wouldnt it be awesome that pressing an action group would turn off the boosters, detach them and throttle down the main engines to 50%?

Some sort of slider in the action groups menu with the context "set throttle"
I'm not shuttle builder, but I think, that it's a nice idea.
